actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide for the payment of tuition, in addition to educational assistance allowances, for veterans pursuing educational programs.

summary.text: Provides for the payment of tuition, in additon to educational assistance allownaces, for veterans pursuing educational programs. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 1681A)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide for the payment of tuition, in addition to educational assistance allowances, for veterans pursuing educational programs.
